definition: hematoma (internal blood clot)/extravasated blood (spilt into surrounding tissue)/contusion
clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis
(in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)

sentences.english: It is indicated that childhood asthma should be treated through phlegm and blood-stasis.
sentences.chinese: 小儿哮喘应从痰瘀论治，以化痰通瘀为治则。

sentences.english: You are breaking some vessels and creating circulation and bruising and that may have some anti-inflammatory effects.

sentences.english: Bruises heal but the pain from mental bullying doesn't just go away.
sentences.chinese: 瘀青可以痊愈，但精神创伤却消不掉。

sentences.english: It is indicated that childhood asthma should he treated through phlegm and blood-stasis.

sentences.english: Bruising can last anywhere between two days and two weeks.

sentences.english: The main accompanying tongue changes were dark purple color and petechia or bruise.

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effects of Tangyuxiao capsule on promoting blood circulation to remove blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨糖瘀消胶囊的活血化瘀作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Dianbaizhu Syrup" is effective for vertebrobasilar insufficiency vertigo of phlegm-blood accumulation, with shorter course and few side effe.

sentences.english: Collateral stasis and obstruction is the important developing link.

sentences.chinese: 一些人的身上还带着瘀青或前一天留下的伤痕。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo research the function mechanism of anti-hyperuricuria through warming kidney and removing blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究温肾化瘀法治疗高尿酸血症的作用机理。

sentences.english: Thus, interlinking of phlegm retention and blood stasis is basic pathological characteristics of inflammation of low degree.
